introductoryNarration.content: Welcome to the consensus layer where community agreement is built through structured dialogue and collaborative decision-making. This interface enables you to participate in consensus processes that shape important civic decisions and community policies.

navigationGuidance.title: üîç Building Community Consensus
navigationGuidance.content: The consensus interface shows active consensus-building sessions with different discussion phases: information gathering, perspective sharing, concern addressing, and agreement formation. Participate by contributing insights, acknowledging valid concerns, and working toward solutions that serve the broader community interest.

privacyNotice.title: üîí Transparent Consensus with Privacy
privacyNotice.content: Your consensus participation is recorded to maintain process integrity while protecting individual privacy. The system tracks constructive contributions without revealing personal positions on sensitive topics. Consensus outcomes are transparent while individual input remains appropriately confidential.
